org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.process
Class AeXMLDBLogStreamReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.process.AeXMLDBLogStreamReader
public class AeXMLDBLogStreamReader
extends java.io.Reader

This class is responsible for putting a Reader facade on the process log for a given process. The process log resides in the DB broken up into several different doc instances which must be read sequentially. TODO (head) share code with SQL log stream reader

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeXMLDBLogStreamReader.AeXMLDBLogAccessor
          An internal accessor class that is necessary because we can't inherit from both Reader AND abstract XMLDB storage.
